title: Chii-chan no Kageokuri
original_name: ちいちゃんのかげおくり
sinopse: A war film about Chii-chan who played a shadow game with her family where you stare at your shadow for 10 seconds and move away quickly causes an afterimage to stay. During an air raid Chii-chan gets separated from her family. She plays the shadow game and finds her family joining in...
